column5: After three years my blades dulled up and became WAY too much work to try and punch holes by hand... I looked, and looked and looked (so on) for the curved blades and couldn't find them  I stopped in at Magnetewan Bait and Tackle and they had one set remaining...clearly left over from a few years ago. Picked em up, put them on and now I'm all  I've used other hand augers, but these curved blades are just fantastic in comparison.
I had the same issue trying to find them for my 8" a couple years back..  http://www.wholesalesports.com  $22.95 for the 6" set
i have a 6" auger from ht that have the curved blades as well, works fantastic
They sell Mora 8" and 10" curves blades at the new Princes Auto in Barrie.  Edit -- I don't think they had that exact style though..
